issues: NotifierProvider syntax shown is outdated - Riverpod 3.0 was released in September 2025 and simplifies the Notifier API
The example uses NotifierProvider<CartNotifier, CartState> syntax but doesn't show the CartNotifier class extending Notifier<CartState> with build() method
Missing the required build() method override in the Riverpod example
Code generation with @riverpod annotation is mentioned as 'reducing boilerplate by 80%' but not demonstrated
recommendations: Update to Riverpod 3.0 syntax where Notifier class is unified (no more AutoDisposeNotifier/FamilyNotifier variants)
Show complete CartNotifier class extending Notifier<CartState> with build() method that returns initial state
Add code generation example showing @riverpod annotation approach which is now the recommended way
Verify examples work with flutter_riverpod: ^3.1.0 and riverpod_generator: ^4.0.0
